00046 #ifndef _DEBUG_H_
00047 #define _DEBUG_H_
00048 
00049 //_____ I N C L U D E S ____________________________________________________
00050 #include <stdio.h>
00051 
00052 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00054 //#define SOFT_OCD          // when OCD dongle is not used, only VT100 or hyperterminal
00055 
00056 #ifndef _TRACE_
00057 // Disable this switch to remove the Trace code from the compilation
00058 // Enable it to add Traces code on compilation
00059 #define _TRACE_  (DISABLE) // default value
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #ifndef _ASSERT_
00063 // Disable this switch to remove the Assert code from the compilation
00064 // Enable it to add the Assert code from the compilation
00065 #define _ASSERT_ (DISABLE) // default value
00066 #endif
00067 
00075 #if (_ASSERT_==ENABLE)
00076 #  define Assert( expr )      \
00077    {                          \
00078       if( !(expr) )           \
00079       {                       \
00080          trace("\n\r");       \
00081          trace(__FILE__);     \
00082          trace(":");          \
00083          trace_u16(__LINE__); \
00084          while(1) {           \
00085          }                    \
00086       }                       \
00087    }
00088 #else
00089 #  define Assert( expr )
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 
00093 extern U8 _MEM_TYPE_SLOW_ g_trace_en;
00094 
00095 #if (_TRACE_==ENABLE)
00096 void    trace        ( const U8* str );
00097 void    trace_nl     ( void    );
00098 void    trace_hex    ( U8  val );
00099 void    trace_hex16  ( U16 val );
00100 void    trace_hex32  ( U32 val );
00101 void    trace_u8     ( U8  val );
00102 void    trace_u16    ( U16 val );
00103 void    trace_u32    ( U32 val );
00104 void    trace_ptwo   ( U8  hex );
00105 
00106 #else
00107 
00108 #  define trace(        str )
00109 #  define trace_nl(         )
00110 #  define trace_hex(    val )
00111 #  define trace_hex16(  val )
00112 #  define trace_hex32(  val )
00113 #  define trace_u8(     val )
00114 #  define trace_u16(    val )
00115 #  define trace_u32(    val )
00116 #  define trace_ptwo(   hex )
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 #if (_TRACE_!=ENABLE) && (_TRACE_!=DISABLE)
00120 #  error _TRACE_ can only be defined to ENABLE or DISABLE
00121 #endif
00122 #if (_ASSERT_!=ENABLE) && (_ASSERT_!=DISABLE)
00123 #  error _ASSERT_ can only be defined to ENABLE or DISABLE
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 #endif  // _DEBUG_H_
